author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Reference assemblies are needed to develop binary module. To take dependency on PowerShell 6.* features we need reference assemblies.


Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.1.0
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.1.0
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.18267
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0

```

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Here is an issue related to this: #8121

title: Publish NuGet package for reference assemblies for PowerShell 6.*
